name: PASSAGEM_DE_PARAMETROS
select: SELECT p.*, pc.*, po.* FROM product p
join: INNER JOIN product_category pc ON pc.product_category_id = p.product_category_id
INNER JOIN product_option po ON po.product_option_id     = p.product_option_id

name: BUSCA_POR_ID
join: INNER JOIN product_category pc ON pc.product_category_id = p.product_category_id
INNER JOIN product_option po ON po.product_option_id     = p.product_option_id

name: PASSAGEM_DE_PARAMETROS_UTILIZANDO_DATAS
select: SELECT p.*, pc.*, po.* FROM product p
join: INNER JOIN product_category pc ON pc.product_category_id = p.product_category_id
INNER JOIN product_option po ON po.product_option_id     = p.product_option_id

name: UTILIZACAO_GROUP_BY
select: SELECT p.brand, count(*) AS stock FROM product p
join: INNER JOIN product_category pc ON pc.product_category_id = p.product_category_id
INNER JOIN product_option po ON po.product_option_id     = p.product_option_id

name: PASSAGEM_DE_PARAMETROS_LIKE
join: INNER JOIN product_category pc ON pc.product_category_id = p.product_category_id
INNER JOIN product_option po ON po.product_option_id     = p.product_option_id

INNER JOIN product_option po ON po.product_option_id     = p.product_option_id
